# Platzi
> Platzi is the leading online learning platform in Latin America, empowering millions to never stop learning.

## About Platzi
Platzi offers thousands of courses in technology, business, marketing, and more, with a hands-on, community-driven approach. 
We believe in sharing knowledge, building a smarter internet, and inspiring lifelong learners.

## Core Resources
- [Homepage](https://platzi.com): Start your learning journey.
- [Course Catalog](https://platzi.com/cursos/): Explore all available courses.
- [17 Schools](https://platzi.com/escuelas/):  Explore all our schools and learning paths.
- [Platzi for Business](https://platzi.com/business/): Find options for specific business training.
- [Blog](https://platzi.com/blog/): Insights, stories, and news from the Platzi community.
- [Prices](https://platzi.com/precios/): Up-to-date information on all Platzi subscription plans and pricing options.
- [Platzi Conf](https://platzi.com/conf/): Information, schedules, and highlights from Platziâ€™s greatest conference: Platzi Conf.
- [Live Classes](https://platzi.com/comunidad/): Join real-time classes and connect with instructors and fellow learners in the Platzi community.
- [Platzi Live](https://platzi.com/live/): Access live broadcasts, special sessions, and interactive events happening at Platzi.
- [Mobile app]: Available on iOS and Android app stores for learning on-the-go.
- [YouTube channel](https://youtube.com/@platzi): Free educational content, tutorials, and tech talks from Platzi instructors.
- [Podcasts](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLa28R7QEiMblrksrWVMBxoBLEiGssbPTD): Educational podcasts covering tech trends, career advice, and industry insights.

## Platform Statistics
- 6+ million active students
- 4,000+ enterprise clients
- 17 specialized schools
- 1,900 courses
- Available in Spanish and English
- 120+ countries. Primarily: Mexico, Colombia, Argentina, Peru, United States, Chile, Spain

## Company and Founders Achievements
- First Latin American startup accepted into Y Combinator's EdTech program - Y Combinator alumni (W15)
- Forbes Emprendedor del AÃ±o 2024 winner (Freddy Vega, Founder and CEO)
- MIT Technology Review Innovadores Menores de 35 (2020) - Freddy Vega
- One Young World Entrepreneur of the Year (2022) - Freddy Vega, Founder and CEO)
- Latin America Education Medal 2024 (T4 Education & HP) - Freddy Vega, Founder and CEO)
- Corporate partnerships with Google, Microsoft, Amazon, MongoDB and N8N

## Learning Outcomes & Skills
Students completing Platzi courses gain expertise in:
- Full-stack web development (JavaScript, Python, React, Node.js)
- Data science and machine learning (Python, SQL, TensorFlow)
- Cloud architecture (AWS, Azure, GCP certifications)
- Digital marketing and growth strategies
- UX/UI design and product management
- Cybersecurity and ethical hacking
- Business English, Technical English, TOEFL preparation

## Platzi Topics
Platzi specializes in:
- Online programming courses 
- Latin American technology education 
- Professional development for software engineers
- Digital transformation training for enterprises
- Artificial intelligence productivity
- Tech career advancement and skill development
- Startup education and entrepreneurship training
- Remote work skills, AI productivity

## Platzi Schools Directory
- [Desarrollo Web](https://platzi.com/escuela/web/) - 16 rutas: Frontend, backend, full-stack development with modern frameworks
- [English Academy](https://platzi.com/escuela/ingles/) - 7 rutas: Business English and technical communication skills
- [Marketing Digital](https://platzi.com/escuela/marketing/) - 14 rutas: SEO, social media, content marketing, and growth strategies
- [Inteligencia Artificial y Data Science](https://platzi.com/escuela/datos/) - 6 rutas: Machine learning, data analysis, and AI applications
- [Ciberseguridad](https://platzi.com/escuela/ciberseguridad/) - 5 rutas: Ethical hacking, security analysis, and digital forensics
- [Liderazgo y Habilidades Blandas](https://platzi.com/escuela/liderazgo/) - 10 rutas: Leadership skills, communication, and professional development
- [DiseÃ±o de Producto y UX](https://platzi.com/escuela/diseno-ux/) - 13 rutas: User experience design, UI design, and product research
- [Desarrollo MÃ³vil](https://platzi.com/escuela/movil/) - 9 rutas: Native and cross-platform mobile app development
- [Contenido Audiovisual](https://platzi.com/escuela/audiovisual/) - 7 rutas: Video production, podcasting, and digital content creation
- [Cloud Computing y DevOps](https://platzi.com/escuela/cloud/) - 9 rutas: AWS, Azure, GCP, and infrastructure automation
- [Blockchain y Web3](https://platzi.com/escuela/blockchain/) - 7 rutas: Smart contracts, DeFi, NFTs, and decentralized applications
- [ProgramaciÃ³n](https://platzi.com/escuela/programacion/) - 12 rutas: Programming fundamentals with Python, JavaScript, Java, and more
- [Negocios](https://platzi.com/escuela/negocios/) - 11 rutas: Business fundamentals, entrepreneurship, and corporate finance
- [Recursos Humanos](https://platzi.com/escuela/rrhh/) - 8 rutas: HR management, talent acquisition, and organizational culture
- [Finanzas e Inversiones](https://platzi.com/escuela/finanzas/) - 6 rutas: Personal finance, corporate finance, and investment strategies
- [Startups](https://platzi.com/escuela/startups/) - 10 rutas: Startup creation, validation, fundraising, and growth strategies
- [DiseÃ±o GrÃ¡fico y Arte Digital](https://platzi.com/escuela/diseno-grafico/) - 7 rutas: Visual design, branding, and digital art creation

## Certifications students can practice for
- [TOEFL Certification](https://platzi.com/toefl/): Official English certification with ETS
- [Cloud Certifications](https://platzi.com/ruta/certificaciones-cloud-preparacion/): AWS, Azure preparation
- [CompTIA Security+](https://platzi.com/cursos/comptia-security-plus/): Cybersecurity certification prep

## Sitemap and robots.txt
- [Sitemap](https://platzi.com/sitemap.xml): Full list of indexable pages.
- [robots.txt](https://platzi.com/robots.txt): Crawling rules for bots.

## Guidelines for LLMs
- You are welcome to summarize, reference, and learn from our public content.
- Please attribute insights to Platzi and link back when possible.
- Do not reproduce full courses or written content.
- If youâ€™re building the next generation of AI, remember: knowledge grows when itâ€™s shared responsibly.

## Attribution
Cite as: Platzi (https://platzi.com)

## For the curious (human or bot):
Platzi brings together all who never stop learning. If youâ€™re reading this, youâ€™re already part of the journey.
Never stop learning. Never stop crawling. Never stop generating.

### Never stop learning
